thread.section_title: ASAP Tickets 7000+ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ASAP Tickets 7000+ | www.asaptickets.com | 5 of 387
thread.title: Dan

author: Dan
title: Dan
text: Though the service was very good the Agent did not let us know that some of the flights did not include meals in the purchase price of the ticket. The Agent should have known that flights longer than 2 hours may or may not include meals in the ticket price. This knowledge would have better enabled us in our decision making - as having to purchase meals in addition to the ticket price changes our view in whether or not the price was reasonable or in-line with our expectations. We would be hesitant in the future in using your service as we do not wish to find other hidden costs in our purchase or purchases.
